title: Does the problem with bluetooth poor connection was solved? Or the topic is Just dead WITHOUT answer
content: Does the problem with bluetooth poor connection was solved? Or the topic is Just dead WITHOUT answer. Looking forward for any answers. This is something wrong with the android. I got 8.1 oreo and its poor quality of bluetooth Phone calls as well. For instance i got same problem. With my samsung galaxy s8 So its must be some issue with bluetooth protocol. Please fix ot and give US a solutions!!!!
